entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. Temperature falling to 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low 9.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
